hours_text:
## Plan YOUR Visit

## At Historic Saranac Lake, you'll explore how a small community in the northern Adirondacks provided hope and research for tens of thousands of people suffering from tuberculosis.

### Please note: The museum is closed for cleaning and maintenance.

The Saranac Laboratory Museum will be undergoing cleaning and maintenance from Wednesday, January 21, to Thursday, February 5. During this time, the museum will be closed for walk-in visitors. However, visitors can still pre-schedule tickets online in advance. Please be sure to book your visit through our website before you arrive, as we will not be able to accommodate at-the-door ticket sales during these two weeks. We appreciate your understanding as we take this time to care for our historic space. We look forward to seeing you!

[](https://historicsaranaclake.org/visit/)

### [The Saranac Laboratory Musuem](https://historicsaranaclake.org/visit/)

Explore the first laboratory built for the research of tuberculosis in the United States, and learn about Saranac Lake's pivotal role in treating patients from around the world.

[](https://historicsaranaclake.org/trudeau-building/)

### [The Trudeau Building](https://historicsaranaclake.org/trudeau-building/)

**New Exhibits Opening in 2026!**

[](https://historicsaranaclake.org/collections/)

### [The Research Room](https://historicsaranaclake.org/collections/)

admission_text:
## Membership

## With Historic Saranac Lake

## SPRING 2025 MEMBERSHIP DRIVE 

## _Three Cheers for Membership!_

At Historic Saranac Lake, we say, “Three Cheers for Membership!” Your annual membership dues support so much good work at the museum!

Your membership dues are good for twelve months from the date of donation. Active members (those who have paid dues in the past twelve months) are eligible for the following member benefits:

  * All members receive a membership card, free admission to the museum, free admission to many events and tours, and a 10% discount in the museum store. 
  * Members at the $100 level and above receive benefits at museums around the country through the **_[North American Reciprocal Museum Association](http://narmassociation.org/)_**.
  * Business membership secures your business name or logo on our website, and recognition in HSL publications. Business owners also receive free museum admission, free admission to many events and tours, and 10% discount in the museum store.​​

​  
Select your membership level below and make your donation online, or you may mail a check to: Historic Saranac Lake, 89 Church Street, Suite 2, Saranac Lake, NY 12983, Be sure to specify “membership dues” in the memo line.

_We will send you a membership card effective for twelve months from the date you join. Please note that memberships are distinct from our end-of-year annual fund campaign or special fund drives. Member benefits are only available to those with ac...
